description:
Take your bank wherever you go. With MCB Juice, you can check balances, transfer money, manage cards, recharge your mobile, pay bills, and much more—anytime, anywhere.
Register through our instant identity verification, set up your secure four-digit mPIN, and start banking in just a few steps.

Key features include:
• Account summary & transaction history
• Loan details
• Money transfer to MCB customers via mobile number or account number (Send to Mobile)
• Instant mobile phone recharge (Refill)
• Bill payments
• Cardless ATM withdrawals
• Access to selected PayPal services
• Card activation & PIN management
• Online credit card payments & details
• Prepaid card replenishment
• Exclusive offers for Juice and cardholders
• Open additional accounts
• Setup recurring payments

For more details, visit juice.mu or call +230 202 6060.

The app is designed using best in class technologies  and is hosted in the best data centre in Mauritius to make your payment safe and keep all your data safe

Designed by one of the best UI/UX experts in the world

All in one app. ONE APP FOR EVERYTHING. 

One app for all services – recharge, bill payment, payments to financial institutions or other partners, payment for MUGA bookings etc
Security: app hosted in our Data Centre. Payment safe. Data safe. 


New features:

1.	Digital KYC
Previously, to register to my.t money, customers
 had to come to a Telecom Shop. It was a real hassle. People had to queue up and the on-boarding process could take a few minutes. 
We have worked in collaboration with the Bank of Mauritius, and today we announce the digital KYC.
-	Free account. Register from the comfort of your home, or from anywhere. 

Note: Digital KYC for new customers. Existing customers just need to update their app.

How to register?
1)	Enter your phone number and OTP
2)	Scan your NID digitally
3)	Smile on a selfie
4)	Link any of your bank accounts
5)	Create your PIN 
And it’s done.

The process adheres to several international security standards for KYC and even IMF / FATF standards for digital KYC

2.	Payment features
a)	Direct payment from Bank account
Previously customers had to create a wallet and cash-in their wallet from their bank account.
Now, the wallet will still exist. But customers can now choose to make a payment from their bank account directly.
More flexibility for the customers.

b)	Move money
-	P2P – transfer money from my.t money to another my.t money user
-	Share Bill
-	Recharge airtime or data for yourself or for someone else
-	Request money from another my.t money user
-	Pay your bills. 
-	Interbank transfer: possibility to transfer money from your bank account to another bank account

c)	Scan to pay
 you can now use your my.t money app to scan any QR code bearing the Maucas logo. The opposite works as well ie use another payment app to scan the my.t money QR.

3.	Personal Financial Manager (PFM)
my.t money is not only about making payments. It will also be about managing your money with the PFM option. 
-	Set up a budget for your different payments
-	Get notifications of where you have reached in real time
-	Categorise your budget for example Food&Restaurants, Fuel, Medical etc
-	Schedule payments for a day and time convenient to you
-	Schedule transfers (P2P)
-	Schedule Recharge (airtime and data) to never run out
-	Get notifications after the scheduled payment has gone
-	Savings Pots: create savings pots by category to save for your future projects for example Car, Holiday, Shopping etc
-	Schedule automatic transfers with specified amounts to your different savings pots every month

4.	Rewards
We are introducing a dedicated loyalty platform for all my.t money users where you will rewards every day.
You will get points for each transaction you make with my.t money
Points can be accumulated and used to redeem exciting products and services from a catalogue.
Games also present on the app to win gifts everyday:
-	Spin and win: spin a wheel and win gifts
-	Guess and win
-	Shake and win
-	Refer and win: 

How to get your new super app?
Existing customers
Update your my.t money app on your Appstore
Click on log in
Your balance and transaction history has already moved to your new app. 
You will be requested to link your bank account again.  

New customers
Download the app and click on register. 
Follow the instructions for the on-boarding and you will get the app ready to use.

SBM Tag - Your Secure Banking Companion.

Bank on-the-go, manage accounts, transfer funds, and more with ease!

Features include:

1. Account Management: View balances, transactions, and statements.
2. Transfers & Payments: Instant transfers, bill payments, and mobile top-ups.
3. Card Management: Block/activate cards, manage limits, and set alerts.
4. Secure Authentication: Biometric login and multi-factor authentication.
5. Branch & ATM Locator: Find nearby SBM branches and ATMs.
6. Notifications: Real-time alerts for transactions and account activities.
7. Investment & Loan Services: Apply for loans and explore investment options.
8. Currency Converter: Convenient tool for currency conversions.
9. Customer Support: Access to support and assistance.

This user-friendly app puts your banking needs at your fingertips, ensuring convenience and security while managing your finances.

Download now and experience hassle-free banking with SBM Mobile!

Mo Finans by Cim Finance is a user-friendly app that gives you a secured access to your Cim Finance account(s), anytime, anywhere.

Simple, fast and easy to use, Mo Finans brings your customer experience to a completely new level.

You just need to log in with your National Identity Card (NIC) and your phone number (registered with Cim Finance) and create your personalised MPIN authentication for future log ins.

If you have recently changed your phone number, kindly contact our team on -203 6800 to update your information.

Find out more on the features of the Mo Finans Mobile App:

1. Accounts
• view all your accounts and agreement details
• view your product details
• view your payment history
• view your instalment amount, arrears if any and outstanding balance.
• Manage quick links on dashboard
• View Cim Finance products and services
• Access to Loan Simulator

2. Payments
• pay your monthly instalment and customise your amounts if required
• choose your preferred payment option: MasterCard or Visa cards, Internet Banking or any Banking Apps.
• download your transaction receipt
• view your payment transaction status
• view your payment details

3. Credit cards
• view credit limit & credit card limit used in %
• view your outstanding balance
• view your amount due, minimum due and arrears if any
• download your credit card statement
• register for e-statements

4. Profile
• Change your MPin

5. Stay informed
• get the latest news on Cim Finance
• receive useful tips
• locate our nearest branch and counter with our Locate us tool
• View Cim Finance products and services

6. Security
• initial Log-in with your NIC and phone number
• enhanced security with the One-Time-Password (OTP)
• MPIN authentication
• NIC number scanning facility
• Biometric password setup

For more information, kindly contact us on 2036800

MauBank WithMe is a user-friendly app that allows you to check your account balances, transfer money, manage your debit and credit cards and recharge your mobile. WithMe even lets you open an account from your phone, at any time and from any place convenient to you.
Using state of the art application technology, WithMe is a mobile application having functionalities of an Internet Banking platform, with additional features.  The online banking application combines simplicity and seamless user experience, while ensuring secure access to your MauBank accounts and services.
 
Register WithMe in a few steps! 
Simply download the app from App Store, create the mPIN of your choice using your debit/credit card, PIN, NIC/Passport and Mobile number to enjoy WithMe - A New Banking Experience.

MauBank WithMe Mobile Banking Application lets you:

1. View account details and transactions
* Check your account balance
* Check your transaction history
* View your mini-statement
* View status of your transactions
* Download your account statement 
* Link accounts in other banks 

2.  Pay and Transfer Funds (MUR and Foreign Currency)
* Transfer funds between your own accounts in MauBank
* Transfer funds to another MauBank account
* Transfer funds from MauBank to another local bank instantly through IPS
* Manage your beneficiaries to facilitate your funds transfer
* Pay cardless to a mobile number and withdraw money at any MauBank ATM
* Recharge your phone and that of your friends and relatives anytime
* Setup schedule or recurring funds transfer
* Stop schedule/recurring and cardless funds transfer 
* Register your mobile number to receive funds 
* Pay to a registered mobile number 
* Scan to Pay a MauCAS QR Code 


3. Credit Card
* View your Credit card details, available credit, card limit and much more.
* Access and download your credit card statements
* Pay your Credit card from your Foreign Currency Account or MUR Account
* Activate your credit card
* Set a new PIN for your credit card  
* Block/ unblock your credit card anytime 
* Block/ unblock ATM transactions 
* Block/ unblock POS transactions 


4. Debit Cards 
* Activate your debit card 
* Block/ unblock your debit card anytime 
* Block/ unblock ATM transactions 
* Block/ unblock POS transactions 
* Block/ unblock E-Commerce transactions
* Set a new PIN for your debit card
* Report your debit card as lost or stolen and request for a replacement card

5. Open a new bank account
* New to MauBank – Open a Bank account in 4 easy steps using your NIC and a recent Proof of Address 

6. Authenticate using fingerprint or FACE ID
* Use your fingerprint or FACE ID for authentication 

7. Manage your services 
* Block or unblock your debit or credit card 
* Change your mPIN 
* Refer WithMe to a friend 
* De-register your mobile device not in use 
* Update your personal information 
* Update your mobile number
* Update your beneficiaries’ name and account numbers
* Register for e-Statements

MRAEasy is a mobile app developed by the Mauritius Revenue Authority (MRA). The main scope of this mobile App is to allow employers in Mauritius to file and pay their employees’ Pay-As-You-Earn (PAYE) as well as Contributions (National Pension Fund and National Solidarity fund) on a monthly basis. MRAeasy can also be used to file Individual Income Tax Returns for the income year.

In the quest to ease the employers’ filing, the MRAEasy App prefills ALL the employees’ details for the employer once login is successful. The employer may then add additional employees and/or modify an existing employee’s details. The employer can browse throughout the app without internet connection. An internet connection is required only when the user is logging in, submitting a return and making a payment. 

Apart from filing a consolidated return (PAYE and Contributions), the employer can amend an already submitted return, view history of last five submitted returns as well as making pending payments. Current payment arrangement modes allowed by the MRA are:
1. Direct Debit and 
2. Payment at the MRA Cash Office.

blink by Emtel is a mobile payment app available on any smartphone. Connect any Mauritian Rupee bank account and enjoy seamless instant transactions at ZERO charges. Send and receive money instantly, pay bills, recharge mobile and broadband, and shop securely—all from one app.

Available on any network, any smartphone, and with any bank, blink is the most user-friendly payment app in Mauritius. Licensed by the Bank of Mauritius, it supports all MauCas-approved QR codes and recently added UPI which enables users to Scan & Pay in India.

App Features:

Scan & Pay any MAUCAS QR Codes
Scan & Pay any UPI QR Codes
Instant Money Transfers at ZERO Charges
Pay Bills
Mobile Recharge
Auto-Payment
Exclusive Offers & Rewards
Secure, Real-Time Transactions

MCB's SmartApprove application allows corporate signatory users to authorise their transactions using transaction signing.
You will be able to login and authorise your payments in a simple and secure way. The application has the below main features:
·        Device registration using the bank user’s internet banking credentials backed by a two-factor security via one time password.
·        Authorise transactions In-band and Out of band.
·        Biometric features.
·        A dashboard providing the user with details on transactions already executed.
·        Receive notifications when making a payment to a new beneficiary, or an existing one with new account details or a beneficiary to whom payments have not been made during the last 18 months

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

1. Apply for Credit:

No more waiting in long queues or dealing with complicated paperwork. Noula allows you to apply for credit right from your smartphone. Our intuitive application process ensures a smooth and hassle-free experience. Just a few taps, and you're on your way to securing the funds you need.

2. View Existing Credit Facilities:

Keeping track of your existing credit facilities has never been this straightforward. Get a comprehensive overview of your financial commitments and repayment schedules, all at your fingertips.

3. Pay Monthly Instalments:

Say goodbye to missed payments and late fees. Noula enables you to make monthly instalment payments with ease.

4. View Outstanding Balance:

Curious about your current outstanding balance? Noula keeps you informed about your financial obligations at all times. Instantly check how much you owe on each credit facility.

First Mobile Banking Application for SME

We know that you love doing everything on your phone from fixing plans with your friends to get the latest news updates to shopping for your favorite brand. So when you live this digital life, why should banking be any different?

Presenting the all-new Mobile banking app for SMEs, JuicePro By MCB – your go-to mobile banking app for SMEs that seamlessly combines the thrill of modern living with the utmost professionalism and advanced security for your everyday banking needs.

JuicePro By MCB brings the power of a bank branch directly to your fingertips, offering an array of services that are not only safe and secure but also incredibly user-friendly. Here's a taste of what you can expect:

Account Overview: Get a quick snapshot of all your account balances.
Loan Insights: Dive into the details of your repayments and interest rates.
Effortless Payments: Swiftly transfer funds between MCB accounts and other local banks.
Transaction History: Swipe through your most recent transactions for quick reference.
Beneficiary Management: Easily manage and locate beneficiaries with our handy search bar.
Multi-Signatory Approvals: Streamline transactions for companies with multiple signatories.
Quick & Secure Login: Access the app securely with your biometrics or MPIN.
Scan-to-Pay: Effortlessly make on-the-go payments with a simple scan.
Overdraft Solutions: Obtain an overdraft within five working days to manage unexpected cash flow challenges.
Foreign Currency Transfer: Transfer money around the world in multiple currencies, safely and seamlessly.

And that's just the beginning! We're continually enhancing your banking experience with exciting new features.

How to join us and be a part of #JuicePro?

Just log in with your username and password. Create your MPIN and voila, now you are part of #JuicePro, enjoy all the amazing features of our app. 
Don’t have a username yet? We’ve got you covered. Just create one within our app with your Card details.

Become a #JuicePro member.
Embrace the future of banking with #JuicePro. Download the app now and simplify your life!!!

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.

Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

description:
This SICOM MyLink app aims at providing a mobile platform for customers to view their policies at glance and to engage with SICOM through an array of e-services including the possibility of paying for outstanding invoices and submitting a claim notification.

The public at large can also download the App and subscribe with SICOM to learn more about SICOM products and services, and can request an online quote for the product of their choice.

The functionalities present in the app are as follows: -

View Product Features & Highlights
Get an Insurance Quote instantly
Payment of outstanding dues
Submit Claim Notifications for Car, Home and Medical with the possibility of uploading documents, pictures, voice note and even sending Google Map location
View Policy Details
Hassle-free and streamlined registration process with secure mPIN and biometric login
Ability for customers to refresh their personal information (email address and phone number)
Locate SICOM branches with Google Map together with branch contact details
Contact Towing Services and submit a query
Get information on SICOM offers
For more information, please visit us on sicom.mu

The Dubai Financial Market app provides investors with real time prices, latest market information, and numerous features to manage your portfolio.  

Key features: 

Apply for an Investor Number 
Easily apply for a DFM investor number (NIN)  within a few minutes online through the app. Your investor number is your first step in starting to trade.  

Market Information 
Real-time data for DFM and Nasdaq Dubai listed companies, Equity Futures, ETFs, Bonds and Sukuk. 
Market depth for all listed securities. 
Company information with key trading information, announcements & disclosures, the top shareholders, financial ratios, and more. 

Stay up to date 
Create customized watch lists and keep track of your favorite companies. 
Set price alerts and stay abreast of the latest changes. 

Market Performance 
Track market performance and the latest trends through indices and trading statistics. 
View the market’s movers and shakers by value, volume and price change. 

Portfolio View
View your investments, account balances, and performance.
View and download your statements and cash dividend history. 
Submit and track share transfer requests. 

iVESTOR
Apply for a free iVESTOR card and easily receive your cash dividends.
View your balance and spending history. 
Control the status of your card, where and when it can used, and the spending limits directly  from the app. 

Log in with your registered eServices username and password. If not registered, sign up through the App.
